name: zip-extractor
title: ZIP Archive Extractor
content:
Overview

This application extracts files from ZIP archives. It supports standard ZIP compression formats and provides detailed information about the extraction process including compression ratios and file counts.

Features

  • Extract all files from ZIP archives
  • Display archive contents before extraction
  • Calculate compression ratios and file sizes
  • No external dependencies required (uses Python stdlib)
  • Preserve directory structure from archive

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload the ZIP archive from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for extracted files

Output

The application extracts all files from the ZIP archive to the output directory, preserving the original directory structure from within the archive.

Use Cases

  • Extract compressed data archives
  • Unpack software distributions
  • Process batch-uploaded files
  • Access contents of compressed backups
